## Edit Gallery Section Properties Help
- Title: the title (heading level 2) to give this section, blank for none. - Path: to the gallery (don't include /galleries), for example: `/Board-Members` - Show: the show in the gallery to collect the image list from - List Id: a special DOM id given just to the image list for use with styling (web developers care about this) - Classes: classes that apply to this entire section - Language: primary language this section's copy is written for
